data.title: Banquet & Weddings
data.text:
Our bread serving with two different newly baked breads from our bakery and a lightly whipped butter

Starter

PMs own stirred whitefish roe with a variation of German asparagus, served with crispy radish, potatoes from Vassmolösa, herbs and an oil with chlorophyll

Main course

Herb baked corn-fed chicken breast from Munka-Ljungby with a crispy nugget, potato- and hard cheese terrine, luke-warm salad of fresh white cabbage, baked yellow beets, ramson, pan-seared scallions and a gravy with roasted cumin

Dessert

Helena’s rhubarb dessert served in a glass with vanilla bavaroise, freshly cooked rhubarb compote, lemon glace and rhubarb crème, oat crunch and Italian meringue

Our bread serving with two different newly baked breads from our bakery and a lightly whipped butter

Starter

Soup of nettles with a baked organic egg from Gårdsby, served with crunch of sourdough croutons from Bröd & Sovel and bacon from Vimmerby, boiled turnip, grated organic Havgus-cheese 24 months and herbs

Main course

Butter fried trout from Tjärö, variation of cauliflower, lightly-smoked carrots from Botulf, onions tossed in butter, spinach and a pickled fennel and dill, served with a light white wine sauce flavored with Pernod

Dessert

Our confectioners classical chocolate dessert served in a glass with a caramelized milk chocolate mousse, brownie, salt caramel and pecan

645 SEK per person ex VAT
